Grid-Based Resource Management of Naval Weapon Systems
publication.keyword: Grid Computing;Resource Manager;Resource Management System;Open Grid Service Architecture;
publication.abstract: The continuous transformation of the Chinese navy into an integrated and network-centric capability requires a cooperative and distributed weapon resource management system. As one of the steps into naval information grid our objective is to develop generalized principles for grid computing that can be applied to this specific domain. To address this problem, we adopt the OGSA (Open Grid Service
